body:
I have to say goodbye to the server in game I will still use the forums once in a while and I will still be active on Skype if you want to contact me my Skype is on my profile. I am quitting because the server and Minecraft in general is just not enjoyable for me anymore. The few days I haven't played my school grades are improving along with my social life so it is for the best. Spending 5 hours a day playing a video game was getting me no where in life. Wished I could have got the chance to be staff for a little while but it doesn't really matter now or in the future. So not really a goodbye to the community just saying I will not be active on the server again. I would like to thank the staff that have helped me a lot on Avicus Jozz, Peachy, Battle, Mountie, Iz, Docta, Evo, Para, Cina, Dubby, Roman, Pete, MidNight and Sli. Thank you to my friends which most of you I will still talk to on Skype. Thanks for the memories bye for now <3 -99

Ps: I will do my best to keep Show Your Face To The World updated.
body_tagged:

Wished I could have got the chance to be staff for a little while but it doesn't really matter now or in the future. So not really a goodbye to the community just saying I will not be active on the server again. I would like to thank the staff that have helped me a lot on Avicus Jozz, Peachy, Battle, Mountie, Iz, Docta, Evo, Para, Cina, Dubby, Roman, Pete, MidNight and Sli. Thank you to my friends which most of you I will still talk to on Skype. Thanks for the memories bye for now <3 -99

Ps: I will do my best to keep Show Your Face To The World updated.
